kpi_info.title: EPS_AVG_NUMBER_OF_SUBS
kpi_info.use: For the calculation of the average number of home subscribers for each MME, including MMEs outside the home network, the number of subscribers is fetched from the HLR for each MME at five-minute intervals. Note that one subscriber can appear on the VLR/SGSN/MME list at the same time if it is E-UTRAN-, GPRS- and GERAN/UTRAN-attached in parallel.
